meanings.definition: Koses (verb): to engage in a friendly conversation or chat.
meanings.sent1: During lunch, my friends and I koses about our favorite movies.
meanings.sent2: After work, colleagues often koses about their weekend plans.

meanings.definition: Koses (adjective): friendly or sociable in nature.
meanings.sent1: She has a koses personality that makes everyone feel welcome.
